doc.title: Freshmen of the Class of 2017 started Their New Life at Nankai University [Part One]
doc.snippet: Balitai Campus adopted the traditional process for the registration: all registration places, including the one-stop service entrance to the dormitory, the household registration, and the green channel, were all set up in one area. On the contrary, at Jinnan Campus the registration work was carried out directly in the 15 colleges and schools to leave a lasting impression of buildings and disciplines on the freshmen and their parents. For the first time in history, the students registered for the dormitory rooms before the registration for the academic courses.
